org.dotplot.ui.actions
Class PlotAction

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.ui.actions.PlotAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
GridCallback
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlotJobAction
public class PlotAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements GridCallback

PlotAction creates a DotPlot from all checked files in the navigator.

See Also:
IWorkbenchWindowActionDelegate
